summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillProof Social Platform video functionality. Backend APIs 100% functional (15/15 tests passed). Successfully tested user registration, login, feed display, search/filter, validation system, and leaderboard. CRITICAL ISSUE FOUND: Video content-type serving as 'text/html' instead of 'video/mp4' causing ERR_BLOCKED_BY_ORB error and preventing video playback. Videos also missing HTML5 controls attribute.

critical_bugs.issue: Video files served with content-type 'text/html; charset=utf-8' instead of 'video/mp4'
critical_bugs.impact: Causes ERR_BLOCKED_BY_ORB error, prevents video playback completely

ui_bugs.issue: Videos missing 'controls' attribute for HTML5 controls

integration_issues.issue: Videos fail to load due to incorrect content-type headers

passed_tests: User registration with email, password, display name, and skill category
User login with JWT token authentication
Feed page displaying real user posts (no dummy data)
Search functionality by keyword (title, description, username)
Filter posts by skill category with dropdown selection
Post validation system with 'I Learned This' button
Validation count updates and button state changes
Profile page navigation and stats display
Leaderboard showing real users only (no static data)
All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed)
CORS headers present for video serving
Range request support for video streaming
Real user-generated content verification (no dummy data)
Navigation between all pages (feed, upload, profile, leaderboard)
Form validation and user input handling
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix video content-type serving issue. Videos are being served with 'text/html; charset=utf-8' instead of 'video/mp4' causing ERR_BLOCKED_BY_ORB error. Also add 'controls' attribute to video elements in PostCard component. The backend video serving code looks correct, but Kubernetes ingress or routing may be overriding content-type headers.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 85% (video playback critical issue)
